comments.en: Cartridge containing toner and imaging drum

Cheap, compact desktop laser printer, foldable tray for 150 sheets, A4/Letter/Legal, up to 14 pages/min. Somewhat faster than the LaserJet 1010, "Fastres 1200" resolution enhancement.

In contrary to the LaserJet 1010/1012 this printer understands PCL 5e and is therefore compatible to many older HP laser printers as the LaserJet 4 or LaserJet 1100. So it can be used with standard drivers as HPIJS, GIMP-Print, or "ljet4".
